main_html_text:
An overview of tds-lib the TEC-Digital standard library, how to download and use, basic templates, examples, and more.

tds-lib is a set of user interface interactions, effects, widgets, and themes. Whether you're building highly interactive web applications or you just need to add some of the widgets below!

To add tds-lib into your website what you need is just a single line of code. You don't even have to download or install anything!

Paste the following code into the section of your site's HTML.

<link rel='stylesheet' href='/resources/tds-lib/css/tds-lib.css'>

Paste the following code if you want to use the font icons.

<link rel='stylesheet' href='/resources/tds-lib/css/tds-fonts.css'>

Paste the following code if you want to use the spinner, validations, tabs and javascript selects.

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/js/tds-lib.js'></script>
buttons_html_text:
Use 'tds-lib_form' class for Button Tag.

<button type='submit' class='tds-lib_form' disabled=''>Save 2</button>
commonlibs_html_text:
The idea is that for now all developers use the latest versión of jquery, jquery ui, or one of the many plugins than they must use,but here is the repository of the previous versions used in older TEC-Digital projects.

Jquery repository

If you need to use the latest version of jquery (jquery v2.1.1) into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML: 

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery/jquery-2.1.1/jquery-2.1.1.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-2.0.3, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML: 

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery/jquery-2.0.3/jquery-2.0.3.min.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-1.11.1, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery/jquery-1.11.1/jquery-1.11.1.min.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-1.10.2, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery/jquery-1.10.2/jquery-1.10.2.min.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-1.9.1, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery/jquery-1.9.1/jquery-1.9.1.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-1.8.2, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery/jquery-1.8.2/jquery-1.8.2.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-1.7.2, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery/jquery-1.7.2/jquery-1.7.2.min.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-1.7.1, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery/jquery-1.7.1/jquery.min.js'></script>


Jquery-ui repository

If you need to use the latest version of jquery-ui (jquery-ui v1.11.1) into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery-ui/jquery-ui-1.11.1/jquery-ui.min-1.11.1.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-ui-1.10.3, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery-ui/jquery-ui-1.10.3/jquery-ui-1.10.3.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-ui-1.10.2, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery-ui/jquery-ui-1.10.2/jquery-ui-1.10.2.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-ui-1.10.1, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery-ui/jquery-ui-1.10.1/jquery-ui-1.10.1.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-ui-1.10.0, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery-ui/jquery-ui-1.10.0/jquery-ui-1.10.0.js'></script>

If you need to use jquery-ui-1.8.16, into your web site, paste the following code into the <head></head>
 section of your site's HTML:

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/jquery-ui/jquery-ui-1.8.16/jquery-ui.min-1.8.16.js'></script>

Other common libraries

Library nameDescriptionOnline documentationUsers that can help in TEC-Digital
Library nameDescriptionOnline documentationUsers that can help in TEC-Digital

jsPDF

jsPDF is an open-source library for generating PDF documents using nothing but Javascript. You can use it in a Firefox extension, in Server Side Javascript and with Data URIs in some browsers.

jsPDF
  • Jacqueline Solis (tatianasolis@gmail.com)
  • Laura Coto (laocoto10@gmail.com)
  • Rafael Oliver M. (rolivermurillo@gmail.com)

Cared

jquery.caret.js is a jquery plugin that manipulate the caret's position in a text box or content-editable element.

jquery.catet.js
  • Laura Coto (laocoto10@gmail.com)

tinyMCE

TinyMCE is a platform independent web based Javascript HTML WYSIWYG editor control released as Open Source under LGPL.
TinyMCE has the ability to convert HTML TEXTAREA fields or other HTML elements to editor instances.

tinyMCE.js
  • Allan Porras A. (allanpa88@gmail.com)
  • Johan Serrato (jomasero@gmail.com)

Highcharts

Create interactive charts easily for your web projects.

highcharts.js
  • Allan Porras A. (allanpa88@gmail.com)
  • Ana Lucía Villavicencio R. (ana.villa@gmail.com)
  • Johan Serrato (jomasero@gmail.com)
  • Rafael Oliver M. (rolivermurillo@gmail.com)

Code import to other common libraries

jsPDF

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/JsPDF/jspdf-0.9.0rc2.0rc2/jspdf-0.9.0rc2.js'></script>

Caret

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/Caret/jquery.caret.js'></script>

Highcharts

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/Highcharts/Highcharts-4.0.3/js/highcharts.js'></script>

TinyMCE

<script src='/resources/tds-lib/lib/TinyMCE/tiny_mce-3.4.4/tiny_mce_src.js'></script>
